description: HiWave RustKit WebSuite - deterministic website-like test cases for visual regression

cases.name: Typography-heavy Article
cases.description: Tests font rendering, line-height, text decoration, and multi-column layout

cases.name: Card Grid with Flexbox
cases.description: Tests flexbox layout, shadows, borders, and responsive grid

cases.name: Form Elements
cases.description: Tests input fields, buttons, checkboxes, radio buttons, and select

cases.name: Image Gallery
cases.description: Tests image loading, sizing, object-fit, and lazy loading

cases.name: Sticky Header + Scroll
cases.description: Tests sticky positioning, overflow clipping, and scrollable regions

cases.name: Gradient Backgrounds
cases.description: Tests linear and radial gradients with various stops and directions

cases.name: Flex Positioning
cases.description: Tests flex item positioning, gap, alignment, nested flex, and form controls in flex

cases.name: CSS Selectors
cases.description: Tests CSS selector matching: combinators (> + ~), attribute ops (~= |= ^= $= *=), pseudo-classes (:first-child :last-child :nth-child :not)
